column2: [Deprecated] The Holo version of my popular Android Talon for Twitter app, 100% open-source

column5: Add deprecation notice, in favor of material design version

Merge pull request #44 from rgarza/compat_with_oreo

added create channel for service notifications for 8.1 compatibility
added create channel for service notifications for 8.1 compatibility
Fix the scheduled tweet activity to close #43
apply the longer (280 character) tweets to the split tweet functionality
update some dependencies and version number
read the tweet character count from the AppSettings, instead of locking it to 140 characters
don't use the emojiable edit text when replying to tweets or composing tweets
[New] Integrate Emoji compat to allow usage of new Android O emojis for Android 4.4+
Add FileProvider to stop linking file:/// uris. Closes #40
Update to the latest twitter4j fork
Some bug fixes around the tweet storms

Merge pull request #39 from vanita5/tld

Add .party TLD
Each tweet in the tweet storm should be in reply to the last

Merge pull request #38 from wolverine2k/multitweet-pull

Add "tweetstorm"

Updated according to comments.

Still need some proper testing WRT the reply and updates to
twitter.
Removed the delay between multi-split tweets

Merge pull request #37 from zfhrp6/hashtag_with_leading_whitespace

fix: string without leading whitespaces become hashtag

match first # in tweet, and don't match non-leading whitespace hashtag.

 #hashtag => match
 foo#hashtag => not match
 foo #hashtag => match
fix: string without leading whitespaces become hashtag

Add an open source article library key

Individual users no longer need to generate their own
fix the build errors from the new japanese strings

Merge pull request #34 from ScanBcn/master

Error "ARTICLE_API_KEY"

Error "ARTICLE_API_KEY" 

Fails if secrets.propertis not exist, the key property name is incorrect.
[New] Search all of twitter when auto completing a user mention
Update link to get token for article viewer
Update article library one more time
Move to release version of article library
[New] bring in my fork of twitter4j so that we can use the expanded tweet mode

Fix saving images in PhotoViewerActivity (#31)

* Slight refactoring, removed useless fields, more logging

* Slight cleanup for IOUtils.saveImage

Used standard pictures directory for external storage

* Request permissions for saving photo from PhotoViewerActivity

Merge pull request #30 from karlicoss/fix-retweet-protected

Removed unnecessary check for retweeting protected account

Merge pull request #29 from karlicoss/fix-youtube-tweets

Fix crash on opening tweets with youtube videos
Fix crash on opening tweets with youtube videos
[New] Added a privacy policy to link to
Added a release_description file to be used by CI
grab the build number from the a build server if it is available and use it as the version code
get the release builds working on CI server
more optimizations for the build pipeline

Merge pull request #28 from karlicoss/secrets-properties-sample

Sample file for secret.properties
refactor and change the way the api keys are stored
[Improve] Don't require permissions that may not be available on chromebook
added the new icon to this repo as a place to host it
[New] Auto fill the current profile info when you attempt to update it from within talon
[New] Use the image editor for banner and profile picture uploads
[Fix] Make sure quotes run through the correct account and that the person being quoted is in fact you.
[New] Add quoted tweets to the activity refreshes
[New] Crop, zoom, and rotate images before they are posted
translateURL: fix the missing initialization of variable
[New] Write the new translate url into shared prefs after updating the app
[Fix] Intent chooser doesn't work in pending intents
[Improve] Some GIFs that are 100 px width are way to bad of quality to post, get rid of them on the gif searching
[Improve] Some wording and return 60 results from Giffy API
[Improve] Only display GIFs whose quality is not completely destroyed by the 3mb twitter max size

[New] Add Giffy disclaimer:

Twitter only allows 3 mb GIFs, Talon will grab the highest quality that it can from Giffy.
adjust the scale type on the compose window
[New] Display the Giffy trends when the search activity is started
[Improve] gradiant at the bottom of the GIFs
[Improve] Add a ProgressDialog while the gifs are downloading
[Improve] Get the highest quality gif that twitter can post (3mb)
[New] Add a play and select button, download, and tweet the GIFs
[New] View and play the list of giffy results with a recycler view
[New] Add some dependencies to prepare for showing GIFs in a recyclerview
[New] Start filling the Giffy search layout
[New] Add button to compose screen to start the GIF searching
[Update] Add import for search view and set up a few new activities

[?] Sometimes activity gets stuck refreshing.

This isn't a fix or an improvement, but it will stop the data limit from driving through the roof
[Fix] Issue with not being able to see list members
[New] Alert the user that they can update to the material design version of the app.

better Youtube detection

Fix a problem when a link contains the word "youtu" and it is not a youtube video, such as this tweet: https://twitter.com/MKBHD/status/668103691975675904

Talon will try to add a youtube page that gives an error.
[Improve] Display the dialog again if the user clicks 'Learn More' on custom tabs
[Fix] Security exception on custom tabs for some devices
[Improve] Don't force google chrome to be the defualt browser for custom tabs
[Fix] Add untracked file to fix build.

[Fix] Bad layouts on the tweet and profile viewers

This was coming from a bad support library update that isn't compatible with the build target. So manually specify the support library version.

[Well] Video uploading keeps saying twitter's servers are overloaded...

Comment it out until I can figure out what that response actually is
[Fix] Use the correct layout on the reply button for android wear
[New] Add reply button to tweets on Android Wear
[Improve] Allow Android Wear app to access settings and compose when there are no unread tweets.

[New] Revamp Android Wear support.

- New layouts
- Support for favoriting and retweeting status's
- Support for compoosing tweets
[New] Remove character limit on conversation activity for dm's
[Improve] just use testCompile notation on build.gradle
[Improve] We don't like duplicate direct messages
[New] Direct messages no longer have a character count on them.
[Improve] that string was funny, lets fix it
[Improve] Favorite users text changed to favorite users tweets
[Improve] Clicks on the quoted tweets in the interactions adapter will actually do something
[Fix] Few things with the quoted tweets for talon pull.
[Improve] Have the quote notifications run through the mention notification setting

[New] Notification of quoted tweets when streaming

Also updated Twitter4j
[Oops] update the preference when it is clicked
[Improve] Make sure to update the Talon pull notification if the pref changes
[New] Option to disalbe talon pull notification

[Fix] Issue with clickable links.

If that link was at the end of a line of text, then clicking any of the empty space after that link would count as clicking the link, which is not how we wanted it to be.
[Improve] Always open meerkat and periscope links in external browser
[Fix] Links being shortened too much again

[Improve] Favorite user notifications.

Remove requirement for timeline notifications to be enabled to use favorite user notifications
[Fix] Some long links are not clickable
[Fix] Manifest will now find the correct activities and services for wear app
[Fix] Build the Android Wear app with a signed release key

[New] Support Twitter's new 'Quote' Method.

This is enabled by default.
[Improve] Add a media controller to the video view when viewing twitter videos.
[Fix] GIFs not looping on all devices

Merge pull request #12 from jcoetzee/update-gradle

Update gradlew to 2.3

Merge pull request #11 from jcoetzee/play-services

Use individual compile directives for Google play services

[Fix] Display page number, not index on photo viewer.

Ex: 1 of 4 vs 0 of 4.

[Fix] Trimming the activity database.

Seems to me that it wasn't doing things correctly before, it would remove everything except the mentions. This seems to do the trick though.

[New] Title on the multiple pictures pager.
>
 Displays 'x of y' pictures. Ex: '2 of 4'.
[Fix] Not displaying images in the tweetviewer if they aren't turned on for the timeline.
[Fix] Forgot a few instances of checking for youtube
[Fix] Profile pictures clicks on the activity fragment
[New] Button at the bottom of a blank activity screen to take you to explaination
[New] Apply favorites on status to the Activity Page

[New] View favorites on a status.

1.) Added FavoriterUtils to return a list of users
2.) Converted the retweeters popup to a view pager for both retweets and favorites

Inspired by Joaquim Verges (@joenrv)
[Improve] Clicking a picture that is a GIF preview will open and play the GIF

[New] Animated GIF preview images.

The animated gifs are offically coming down through the 3rd party api, so we get preview images and direct links to them now.
[Fix] Opening external browser from plain text browser
[Fix] Send users to the correct settings page
[Improve] Default pages. Add the activity page to the left
[New] Add screenname to the activity notification title
[New] Redirect correctly when using the second account activity notification

[Fix] Find new followers according to screen name.

Fixes problems with using a second account refresh
[Fix] Activity shouldn't override one of another type
[Fix] Fill in a little more info on the retweet activity values
[New] Add the content of the notification for activity background refreshes
[New] Set up for nofications on activity
[New] Sync second account activity in the background
[Fix] Display the correct dialog when multiple new users follow you
[Fix] Not being able to open a profile
[New] Save the new followers to one activity row

[New] Added some methods to check for updates in the background

This doesn't currently work though since talon is unpublished from the play store :/
[Fix] Make sure we remove the no activity placeholder in all cases
[New] Display a message about activity if there isn't any in the database yet.

[New] Option to disable the interaction drawer

Will be helpful if users would rather just use the activity page
[Fix] Redirect to activity page from notification
[New] Finish adapter for the activity page

[New] Starting work on a cursor adapter for the activity

tested and fixed issues with the actual refreshes of the activity

[New] Start pulling in activity results.

Adapter isn't created yet
[New] Added database methods to write mentions, new followers, retweeters, and favorites to activity database

Merge pull request #8 from sudoes/quickfix

[Fix] Google Chrome intent firing
[New] Added initial databases for activity information

[New] Create and enable selection of the activity fragment

Right now it is just similar to a mention page though.
[New] Add utils, service, and settings for activity fragment
[New] Implement cross account retweets and favorites

[New] Add settings for cross account actions

Will include favorite and retweets from the timeline expansion or the tweet viewer

[Improve] Actually remove TwitPic option.

Not sure why this was still there.
[Fix] Some ow.ly links appearing as images

[Improve] Smooth out main cursor adapters

No need to find the column every time, can't believe I was doing it that way.
[New] Start looking into video support and todo's for it
[New] Add SQL for saving favorite tweets
[Fix] Up navigation on the in app browser
[Improve] Logic for determining if a tweet is in a conversation
[New] Add indicator to tweets if they are apart of a conversation
[New] Upgrade home and mentions database for a column storing whether or not the tweet is part of a conversation
[Fix] Display 'Sending Direct Message' text instead of 'Sending Tweet' text for Direct messages
[Improve] Always show the pictures on a direct message
[Improve] send the external browser to the current webpage instead of the original webpage.
[Fix] sometimes the wrong unshortened link was replaced
[Fix] Force close on the trends pages
[Fix] Don't fail on lint errors, fix build
[Fix] oops on the saving of searches
[Fix] change the way it saves a trends search
[Improve] Remove retweets from searches by default
[Fix] Pick the visible items in the drawer with the new trends option
[New] Get more friends/followers on login and profiles

[Fix] Just notify for long tweetmarker response.

We don't want to skip the result of a long request, we just want to let the user know that it took longer than expected.
[Improve] Add a little more info to tweetmarker time-out dialog
[New] Notify user of long wait times for tweetmarker

Attempt re-make of wear app

The wear app refuses to be pushed to the watch for some reason. This commit attempts to refactor and recreate the wear app from scratch to fix it, but does not work.
[Fix] Catch any cases where a .gif won't be able to play
[Fix] Ensure we insert the animated GIF correctly

[Fix] Be able to retweet a protected account's retweet.

Case: If your friend has a protected account and he retweets something you thought was funny, before, if you would have tried to retweet it, it would have failed because he (or she) had a protected account.

It will now grab and retweet the original tweet instead of the retweeted one.
[Fix] 4 pictures on a tweet has always looked weird.
[Fix] Ensure all pictures are shown on the profile

[New] View Animated GIFs

Currently, it finds the gif's url by parsing the HTML from Twitter's webpage of the tweet.

This commit also prepares for Twitter opening up GIFs in their API. They are obtained from the extended entities in lists, home timeline, and mentions.

With the current method, there are no inline image previews. They should start being filled in when the GET requests start returning the extended entities for GIFs.

Merge pull request #7 from yelinaung/master

Remove tmp files and other files according to .gitignore
remote tmp files and other files according to .gitignore
[Fix] Share images from the picture viewer
[New] Implement new google play services for location
[New] Swipe between multiple pictures on the photo viewer
[Fix] Force close from plain text browser
[Fix] Larger touch zone for interactions drawer

[Fix] In-app broswer

- It should always exit the broswer and not reload the original page if you press the back button on the original broswer page
- Orientation changes will load the current page and not the original page
[Improved] Redirect to second mentions page if it is available

[Improved] Background refresh of second account mentions.

Don't refresh the second account's mentions from the background service if they pull to refresh on that swipable page
[Fix] Build against API 19 again to allow YouTube
[Fix] Pull to refresh reverting to original account

[New] Successfully use the second account from the second account mentions page.

Any twitter action will go through the second account when coming from that page. For example, if I set this page on my swipable page list with @lukeklinker logged in, i can mark tweets as favorite, retweet, reply, quote, and anything else from my @TalonAndroid account without having to actually switch accounts.

[Improve] Begin adjusting second mentions page to use second account twitter object.

This will allow you to reply, favorite, retweet and other common twitter actions on the second account rather than the first.

It isn't done yet though, todo:
- apply to quoting tweets
- apply to tweet viewer/pager
- test to ensure it works
[Fix] Proguard exception for some samsung devices

[New] Broadcast an update to the second account mentions.

This will force update the list view on the second account mentions page if there is one refreshed from the background service
[Improve] Debug failed tweets a bit better
[Cleanup] Log an exception on the custom ringtone
[Fix] Delay that test notification just a bit
[Cleanup] Added function to test the notifications
[Improved] Better clicking on the configuration page checkboxes
[Fix] Drawer item icons not working correctly

[Improved] Support some proguard functions.

This patch reduces the application size and moves around some of the resources. It also updates the build tools to the latest version. You will need the newest version of IntelliJ/Studio to build

[Improved] Icon now has a slight shadow behind it.

Matches the way google does their own icons, to add more depth.
[Fix] Update the correct accounts mentions on the new page
[New] Add an extra page to view the mentions on your second account
[Improved] Show seconds instead of '0m' for timestamp
[Fix/Improve] Force closes from the play store and update translations
[New] Support for img.ly images on your timeline

[New] Open to external or internal broswer on long click

When long clicking a link, this will allow you the choice of opening to eitherthe external or internal browser, instead of defaulting to your settings preference.

[Fix] Force close

Coming from an old instance of how i managed the pages.

Merge pull request #5 from klinker41/master

Cleanup some files and fix build
[Cleanup] remove temp files and correct web icon
[Fix] Configure drawer elements seperately accross accounts

[Fix] Login issues for users that already have a token

Finally found a good way around the login problems. This will trick twitter into letting the user login, then loading the authentication page after they have. Since android saves the cookies from the login, the authentication page will not work and not show the token limit message." -a

[New] Select which activities are shown in the main navigation drawer

Changes:
- Add a new section to the settings page for pages and main drawer
- Main drawer array adapter correctly identifies the colors and highlights the current activity
- Drawer Click listener will adapt to hidden items
- Reset the users pages when you initially load this version
- correctly set the default page
[Fix] Redirect to the correct timeline page
[Fix] Main drawer array adapter now works according to your specified pages

[New] Select any combination of main fragments for the main activity.

Allows you to specify up to 6 swipable pages on the main activity. They are completely custom, so if you do not want a home timeline page or a direct message page, you do not have to use them.

This isn't completely done yet. What isn't working:
- The main drawer array adapter and highlighting the correct current page
- it doesn't take you to the correct mentions page from a notification or the toast
- Wont work well with Blur yet
- Probably some other things I need to find

Be weary if you merge this.

[New] Hold up to 5 extra pages on the timeline.

Be aware that the more pages, the slower performance you will have
[Cleanup] Moved from .jar files to maven central dependencies

[Improved] Simplify the logic for adding extra pages to the timeline

Allows a developer to explicitly specify the max number of extra pages that a user can have on the main activity.

Please keep in mind the drawbacks to this as well.

Currently there is no foreground changes to accomodate adding more than two pages. This will come in a future commit.

[Improvement] Move away from a simple/awkward list of pictures

This creates a grid of pictures on the profile pictures pages and the picture viewer for when there are multiple images in a tweet.

[Fix] refresh animation getting stuck on the blur launcher page

Sometimes the animation wouldn't clear from the launcher page. this will force notify the content resolver that it should update" -a

Published a rough roadmap

By no means final, usually I just work on things in the order I feel is most important to the development of the app.

If something new comes along, then I will be switching to that and some of these will still be postponed

Merge pull request 2

Make Talon-for-Twitter license available in LICENSE file; Meet license requirements of libraries derived from;

Merge pull request #1 from friederbluemle/update-project

Minor project updates

[Fix] Favorite user notifications opening to interaction drawer

If the user isn't streaming or using talon pull, then those favorite user notifications should not open up the interaction drawer
